name: Larkwell Martinez Axe
description: The Larkwell Martinez Axe is the Workshop equivalent of an Steel Axe , allowing Prospectors to fell trees faster while also increasing the amount received from felling trees. Similar to the Inaris "Dias" Axe , the Larkwell Martinez Axe also reduces the carry weight of wood when equipped.
crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench
